author: acegalaxy.bsky.social
text: It just makes me more worried for Shigeki Yanagi honestly. I love them all but he feels like the most alone in all this. He was trying to care for & was deeply involved in trying to help Wada. Then not hearing from Hiroaki (who must also be going through it).... :( None of them deserved any of this.
